name: Red Menace
description:
(Play in Fullscreen!)

Red Menace is a single player arcade-style tower defence shooter based on the 1980 Atari arcade game, Missile Command (Atari, Inc., 1980).

Red Menace pits you as the last defence against mutually assured destruction and total atomic annihilation. Take up the launch controls and stand strong against the constant onslaught of bombs and missiles threatening to destroy your homeland. Can you take on the Red Menace?

Assets and SFX References:

Font -  Anon., n.d. [Minecraft Font][Screenshot]. Available from: https://fontmeme.com/fonts/minecraft-font/ 

Crosshair GFX - Visyde Interactives, 2018. Simple Crosshairs: Pack 1 [Unity Sprite Asset Package]. Available From: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/simple-modern-crosshairspack... 

Missile GFX - 3d.rina, 2021. 2D Sci-Fi Weapons Pack [Unity Sprite Asset Package]. Available From: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/2dsci-fi-weapons-pa... 

Background Music - PIOSystems, 2018. The Ninja Arcade, track 05, Jump Chord Heat [Unity SFX Asset]. Available From: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/the-ninja-arcade-122066

SFX - Little Robot Sound Factory, 2015. 8-Bit Sfx [Unity SFX Asset Package]. Available From: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/8-bitsfx-3283
